alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Eyewall of Hurricane Ian Impacting Northern Sections of Glades County... Hurricane Ian continues to move north northeast around 8 mph. With this movement, radar trends indicate the eyewall of the hurricane is beginning to move over portions of northern Glades county. Wind gusts in excess of 100 mph have been observed in the Fort Myers area within the eyewall, and damaging hurricane force winds are expected to move across northern sections of Glades county over the next few hours. HAZARD...Hurricane force winds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Widespread damage is expected. Locations impacted include... Palmdale, Ortona and Muse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...>100 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in this area should remain sheltered or seek shelter immediately! This is a very dangerous situation.
